column1: Carlos Juaquin, the Govoner of the State of Q.Roo has apparently has tested positive, and is now in Quarantine.https:/…
That's very unfortunate. Hopefully he has a speedy, full recovery.
https:/…I am still checking for August but this is not good. It says Cancun has highest per capita cases in Mexico.
Here in Quintana Roo (and in Mexico), we're still being told to stay home. It's not a good time to travel.
